title: Project Company Data Catalog
description: Validates an entire collection of Project Company Data metadata JSON objects. Agencies produce said collections in the form of Data.json files.

@context.title: Metadata Context
@context.description: URL or JSON object for the JSON-LD Context that defines the schema used

@id.title: Metadata Catalog ID
@id.description: IRI for the JSON-LD Node Identifier of the Catalog. This should be the URL of the data.json file itself.

@type.title: Metadata Context
@type.description: IRI for the JSON-LD data type. This should be dcat:Catalog for the Catalog

backupDestination.description: Backup storage location where backups of data described by this catalog are stored.
backupDestination.title: Backup destination

publishDataCatalog.description: Topic where the data catalog is published and its project
publishDataCatalog.title: Topic where the data catalog is published and its project

describedBy.description: URL for the JSON Schema file that defines the schema used
describedBy.title: Data Dictionary
